alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Escambia; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Monroe, northeastern Baldwin, Escambia, Okaloosa, Santa Rosa and northwestern Escambia Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of McCullough to 5 miles northeast of Baker. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Atmore, Pace, Milton, Brewton, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Baker, McCullough, East Brewton, Molino, Jay, Laurel Hill, Pollard, Riverview, Point Baker, I65 And AL 113, Pea Ridge and Roeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
